analyser
Class Analyser

public class Analyser
extends java.lang.Object

The class Analyser contains methods for analysing the given word.

analyseF

public static java.lang.String analyseF(java.lang.String input)
Returns the analysed output of the given input word.

Parameters:
input - input word
Returns:
the analysed output
See Also:
Method.analyse(java.lang.String, java.util.Stack)

init

public static void init()
Loads dictionary and the corresponding analyser classes into memory so that analysing words from large text would become faster later on. The method should be called first before analysing words from large text like while spell checking a document
